Name: DESY
Comment: DEustche Synchotron, electron synchrotron, injector for Doris and Petra after 1978

Name: PETRA
Comment: Positron-Elektron-Tandem-Ring-Anlage, "positron-electron tandem-ring facility", JADE replaced PLUTO, injector for HERA 1986-2007

Name: HERA
Comment: Hadron-Elektron-Ring-Anlage, "Hadron Electron Ring Facility". Collide protons with either electrons or positrons

Name: ISR
Comment: Intersecting Storage Rings. World's first hadron collider

Name: CESR
Comment: Cornell Electron-positron Storage Ring. Now X-ray source

Name: AGS
Comment: Alternating Gradient Synchrotron. Now, injector for RHIC

Name: TRISTAN
Comment: Transposable Ring Intersecting STorage Accelerator in Nippon. e+e- collider
